inputs.name: headerSize
inputs.text: Defines the size of panel's header.

inputs.name: footerSize
inputs.text: Defines the size of panel's footer.

inputs.name: noLayout
inputs.text: Defines if the main content should have default layout.

projection.name: <ng-template #obStickyHeader>
projection.text: Content that will be projected into the header

projection.name: <ng-template #obStickyMain>
projection.text: Content that will be projected into the main container

projection.name: <ng-template #obStickyFooter>
projection.text: Content that will be projected into the footer
